16. A The chi-square test is used to test hypotheses concerning a single population variance.
Since this is a one-tailed test, the decision rule is to reject H, if x? > the critical
chi-square value at a = 0.05 with df = 24.
_(n-1)s^2_(24)(25)
2= 25.0. The right-tail critical chi-square value is 36.415.
o 24
